entityId.localType: ISMAPNG Archives Stanmore Repository Series Number

biogHist.abstract: Notifications of Discharge is an archival series held by the Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives, Stanmore. These records relate to St Joseph's Orphanage, Goulburn. The Series is made up of six volumes containing copies of Notification of Discharge forms completed to comply with provisions of the Child Welfare Act 1939. The information in the registers includes: name of child; address of custodian; date of removal; removed to care of (name, occupation, address); husband's name and occupation.
biogHist.p: Application for access must be made, in writing, to the Archivist, providing personal identification documents to establish the right to access information. Physical access to the records is not permitted due to their fragility and the need to protect the confidentiality of information concerning other persons. Information will be forwarded by mail.

The Notifications of Discharge are managed by the Institute of the Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea (ISMAPNG). ISMAPNG formed out of the consolidation of 14 of the 17 congregations of the Institute of the Sisters of Mercy in Australia, and from the region of Papua New Guinea. This included the Goulburn Congregation, which ran St Joseph's Orphanage, Goulburn.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives, Stanmore (2012 - )

descriptiveNote.p: The ISMAPNG Archives, Stanmore holds the Notifications of Discharge, St Josephs' Orphanage, Goulburn.
The Notifications of Discharge were created by St Joseph's Orphanage, Goulburn.
